title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions:
Power through every project with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit (DCK240C2). Built for pros and serious DIYers, this compact, lightweight duo delivers the performance, control, and convenience you need on the jobsite or at home.

What you’ll love:
- Two powerhouse tools: The DCD771 1/2-inch Drill/Driver features a 2-speed transmission (0–450/0–1,500 RPM) and 300 UWO for confident drilling and fastening in wood, metal, and plastic. The DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver packs fast, efficient torque in a compact 5.55-inch body for tight spaces.
- Precision and control: Single-sleeve ratcheting 1/2-inch chuck on the drill for superior bit grip, plus an ergonomic handle for comfort and control during long sessions. The impact driver’s 1-handed 1/4-inch hex chuck accepts 1-inch bit tips for quick changes without slowing down.
- See your work clearly: A 3-LED light ring on the impact driver and an LED foot light provide bright, shadow-free visibility, with a 20-second delay that keeps your workspace illuminated after the trigger is released.
- Ready to work all day: Includes two 20V MAX Lithium Ion batteries and a charger so you can keep one battery working while the other charges.
- Built to fit: Compact and lightweight design reduces fatigue and fits where bulkier tools can’t.

What’s in the box:
- DCD771 20V MAX 1/2-inch Drill/Driver
- DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver
- 2x 20V MAX Lithium Ion Batteries
- Charger

From quick fixes to demanding builds, this Yellow/Black DEWALT kit delivers reliable power, pro-grade durability, and jobsite-ready convenience. Get the versatility of a drill and the speed of an impact driver in one must-have set and finish faster with results you can be proud of.
